lead_paragraph: The lawyer representing Kenya's suspended Rita Jeptoo, the Boston and Chicago marathon winner, has withdrawn her services a day before the start of a hearing into the athlete's doping case at the Court of Arbitration for Sport (CAS).

headline.print_headline: Jeptoo's Lawyer Withdraws From CAS Hearing
headline.main: Jeptoo's Lawyer Withdraws From CAS Hearing
